sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Modals = ({ showLogin, showRegister, showPostProperty, onClose, onAddProperty, onLoginSuccess }) => { const [loginForm, setLoginForm] = useState({ email: '', password: '' }); const [registerForm, setRegisterForm] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '', role: 'tenant' }); const [propertyForm, setPropertyForm] = useState({ name: '', description: '', address: '', type: 'apartment', price: '', sqft: '', image: '' }); const handleLoginSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // In a real app, you would authenticate with a backend onLoginSuccess({ name: 'Test User', email: loginForm.email, role: 'landlord' // or 'tenant' }); onClose(); }; const handleRegisterSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // In a real app, you would register with a backend onLoginSuccess({ name: registerForm.name, email: registerForm.email, role: registerForm.role }); onClose(); }; const handlePropertySubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onAddProperty(propertyForm); setPropertyForm({ name: '', description: '', address: '', type: 'apartment', price: '', sqft: '', image: '' }); }; return ( <> {/* Login Modal */} {showLogin && (

Login

setLoginForm({...loginForm, email: e.target.value})} required />
setLoginForm({...loginForm, password: e.target.value})} required />
)} {/* Register Modal */} {showRegister && (

Register

setRegisterForm({...registerForm, name: e.target.value})} required />
setRegisterForm({...registerForm, email: e.target.value})} required />
setRegisterForm({...registerForm, password: e.target.value})} required />
)} {/* Post Property Modal */} {showPostProperty && (

Post a Property

setPropertyForm({...propertyForm, name: e.target.value})} required />
setPropertyForm({...propertyForm, address: e.target.value})} required />
setPropertyForm({...propertyForm, price: e.target.value})} required />
setPropertyForm({...propertyForm, sqft: e.target.value})} required />
setPropertyForm({...propertyForm, image: e.target.value})} required />
)} ); }; export default Modals;
